orego.play

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • orego.play.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Playable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ThreadedPlayer

    public class Player
extends Object
implements Playable
    Chooses moves to play. The default implementation is a pure random player.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player()
      A default player with a random policy.

      Returns the array of heuristics associated with this player.
      int getMillisecondsPerMove()
      Returns the number of milliseconds allocated per move.
      int getMove(int t)
      Returns the move played at time t, or NO_POINT if t is negative.
      String getMoveSequence()
      Returns a String containing a human-readable list of all moves made so far on this board.

      Returns this players opening book.

      Returns the current turn number.

      Clears the board and does anything else necessary to start a new game.
      int selectAndPlayOneMove(ec.util.MersenneTwisterFast random, Board board)
      Selects and plays a random moves, choosing the heuristically best move, with ties broken randomly.

      Sets the board's color to play.

      Plays all of the stones in diagram, row by row from top to bottom.

      Resets board, then plays a series of moves from an .sgf file.

    • Method Detail

      • acceptMove

        public int acceptMove(int p)
        Description copied from interface: Playable
        Accepts the move if possible.
        Specified by:
        acceptMove in interface Playable
        Returns:
        one of the PLAY_... constants from orego.core.Board

      • acceptMoveSequence

        public void acceptMoveSequence(String moves)
        Accepts a sequence of moves as returned by getMoveSequence(). The moves are presumed to alternate starting with the current color to play, and to all be legal.
        Parameters:
        moves - a sequence of moves separated by spaces, e.g., "a1 b2 pass".

      • selectAndPlayOneMove

        public int selectAndPlayOneMove(ec.util.MersenneTwisterFast random,
                       Board board)
        Selects and plays a random moves, choosing the heuristically best move, with ties broken randomly.

      • getCommands

        public Set<String> getCommands()
        Description copied from interface: Playable

      • setUpProblem
